archimate:Capability.name: Quality Management
archimate:Capability.documentation:
The ability to manage the quality and consistency of output from the team. This includes formal quality management in the form of formal reviews as well as ongoing review and guidance of work in a collaborative environment to ensure consistency in style and quality. It also includes continuous improvement activities that review what we do and how we do it, looking for better ways to work.
Outcomes:
Consistency in the level of content and detail across all architecture outputs Higher levels of collaboration and more efficient work Effective review forums and appropriate levels of review and governance
